properties.sql:
SELECT p.id as idProc, dp.c_n_processo as NProc, dp.c_banco_fundo as Banco, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso 
FROM shkprocesses sp
LEFT JOIN shkprocesses sp2 on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = sp2.Id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos_procu p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_proce_procu dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
LEFT JOIN (select ActivityId, group_concat(ResourceId separator '; ') as ResourceId from SHKAssignmentsTable group by ActivityId) sass on sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
LEFT JOIN app_fd_intervenientes_proc ip ON ip.c_id_processo = p.id 
    AND ip.c_cliente_principal LIKE (SELECT i.c_cliente_principal 
                                    FROM app_fd_intervenientes_proc i 
                                    WHERE i.c_id_processo = p.id
                                    AND i.c_cliente_principal = 'CHECK')
WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'
AND (ssta.oid = '1000001' OR ssta.oid = '1000003' OR ssta.oid = '1000005')
